# NWProtocolWebSocket.Version

**Enumeration**

Supported versions of the WebSocket protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Version
```

## Versions

- **NWProtocolWebSocket.Version.version13**: Version 13 of the WebSocket protocol.

## Configuring WebSocket Options

- **init(_:)**: Initializes a default set of WebSocket connection options.
- **autoReplyPing**: A Boolean indicating whether the connection automatically replies to Ping messages instead of delivering them to you.
- **maximumMessageSize**: The maximum allowed message size, in bytes, to be received by the WebSocket connection.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
